Package com.example.demo.repository

Interface MockTestResultRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<MockTestResult,MockTestResultId>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<MockTestResult,MockTestResultId>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<MockTestResult,MockTestResultId>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<MockTestResult,MockTestResultId>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<MockTestResult,MockTestResultId>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<MockTestResult>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<MockTestResult,MockTestResultId>
@Repository public interface MockTestResultRepository extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<MockTestResult,MockTestResultId>

    • findSubjectRanking

      @Query(value=" SELECT rank, subject_score, standard_score, student_name, student_id\n FROM (\n SELECT\n r.student_id,\n s.name as student_name,\n CASE WHEN :subjectField = \'japanese\' THEN r.japanese\n WHEN :subjectField = \'math\' THEN r.math\n WHEN :subjectField = \'english\' THEN r.english\n WHEN :subjectField = \'science\' THEN r.science\n WHEN :subjectField = \'social\' THEN r.social\n WHEN :subjectField = \'total3\' THEN r.total3\n WHEN :subjectField = \'total5\' THEN r.total5\n END as subject_score,\n CASE WHEN :subjectField = \'japanese\' THEN r.japanese_ss\n WHEN :subjectField = \'math\' THEN r.math_ss\n WHEN :subjectField = \'english\' THEN r.english_ss\n WHEN :subjectField = \'science\' THEN r.science_ss\n WHEN :subjectField = \'social\' THEN r.social_ss\n WHEN :subjectField = \'total3\' THEN r.total3_ss\n WHEN :subjectField = \'total5\' THEN r.total5_ss\n END as standard_score,\n RANK() OVER (\n ORDER BY\n CASE WHEN :isAsc = true THEN\n CASE WHEN :subjectField = \'japanese\' THEN r.japanese\n WHEN :subjectField = \'math\' THEN r.math\n WHEN :subjectField = \'english\' THEN r.english\n WHEN :subjectField = \'science\' THEN r.science\n WHEN :subjectField = \'social\' THEN r.social\n WHEN :subjectField = \'total3\' THEN r.total3\n WHEN :subjectField = \'total5\' THEN r.total5\n END\n END ASC,\n CASE WHEN :isAsc = false THEN\n CASE WHEN :subjectField = \'japanese\' THEN r.japanese\n WHEN :subjectField = \'math\' THEN r.math\n WHEN :subjectField = \'english\' THEN r.english\n WHEN :subjectField = \'science\' THEN r.science\n WHEN :subjectField = \'social\' THEN r.social\n WHEN :subjectField = \'total3\' THEN r.total3\n WHEN :subjectField = \'total5\' THEN r.total5\n END\n END DESC\n ) as rank\n FROM mock_test_results r\n JOIN students s ON s.student_id = r.student_id\n WHERE r.mock_test_id = :mockTestId\n ) ranking\n WHERE ranking.rank <= :maxRank\n ORDER BY\n CASE WHEN :isAsc = true THEN ranking.subject_score END ASC,\n CASE WHEN :isAsc = false THEN ranking.subject_score END DESC\n", nativeQuery=true) List<Map<String,Object>> findSubjectRanking(@Param("mockTestId") Integer mockTestId, @Param("maxRank") Integer maxRank, @Param("isAsc") Boolean isAsc, @Param("subjectField") String subjectField)

    • findAllByStudentId

      @Query("SELECT mtr FROM MockTestResult mtr\nJOIN mtr.mockTest\nWHERE mtr.student.id = :studentId\nORDER BY mockTest.date ASC\n") List<MockTestResult> findAllByStudentId(Integer studentId)

    • findAllResultByMockTestId

      @Query("SELECT mtr FROM MockTestResult mtr\nJOIN mtr.mockTest mt\nWHERE mt.id = :mockTestId\n") List<MockTestResult> findAllResultByMockTestId(@Param("mockTestId") Integer mockTestId)

    • findAllResultsByMockTestIdWithSort

      @Query("SELECT m FROM MockTestResult m WHERE m.mockTest.id = :mockTestId ORDER BY CASE WHEN :sortField = \'japanese\' AND :sortDirection = \'asc\' THEN m.japanese END ASC, CASE WHEN :sortField = \'japanese\' AND :sortDirection = \'desc\' THEN m.japanese END DESC, CASE WHEN :sortField = \'japaneseSs\' AND :sortDirection = \'asc\' THEN m.japaneseSs END ASC, CASE WHEN :sortField = \'japaneseSs\' AND :sortDirection = \'desc\' THEN m.japaneseSs END DESC, CASE WHEN :sortField = \'math\' AND :sortDirection = \'asc\' THEN m.math END ASC, CASE WHEN :sortField = \'math\' AND :sortDirection = \'desc\' THEN m.math END DESC, CASE WHEN :sortField = \'mathSs\' AND :sortDirection = \'asc\' THEN m.mathSs END ASC, CASE WHEN :sortField = \'mathSs\' AND :sortDirection = \'desc\' THEN m.mathSs END DESC, CASE WHEN :sortField = \'english\' AND :sortDirection = \'asc\' THEN m.english END ASC, CASE WHEN :sortField = \'english\' AND :sortDirection = \'desc\' THEN m.english END DESC, CASE WHEN :sortField = \'englishSs\' AND :sortDirection = \'asc\' THEN m.englishSs END ASC, CASE WHEN :sortField = \'englishSs\' AND :sortDirection = \'desc\' THEN m.englishSs END DESC, CASE WHEN :sortField = \'social\' AND :sortDirection = \'asc\' THEN m.social END ASC, CASE WHEN :sortField = \'social\' AND :sortDirection = \'desc\' THEN m.social END DESC, CASE WHEN :sortField = \'socialSs\' AND :sortDirection = \'asc\' THEN m.socialSs END ASC, CASE WHEN :sortField = \'socialSs\' AND :sortDirection = \'desc\' THEN m.socialSs END DESC, CASE WHEN :sortField = \'science\' AND :sortDirection = \'asc\' THEN m.science END ASC, CASE WHEN :sortField = \'science\' AND :sortDirection = \'desc\' THEN m.science END DESC, CASE WHEN :sortField = \'scienceSs\' AND :sortDirection = \'asc\' THEN m.scienceSs END ASC, CASE WHEN :sortField = \'scienceSs\' AND :sortDirection = \'desc\' THEN m.scienceSs END DESC, CASE WHEN :sortField = \'total3\' AND :sortDirection = \'asc\' THEN m.total3 END ASC, CASE WHEN :sortField = \'total3\' AND :sortDirection = \'desc\' THEN m.total3 END DESC, CASE WHEN :sortField = \'total3Ss\' AND :sortDirection = \'asc\' THEN m.total3Ss END ASC, CASE WHEN :sortField = \'total3Ss\' AND :sortDirection = \'desc\' THEN m.total3Ss END DESC, CASE WHEN :sortField = \'total5\' AND :sortDirection = \'asc\' THEN m.total5 END ASC, CASE WHEN :sortField = \'total5\' AND :sortDirection = \'desc\' THEN m.total5 END DESC, CASE WHEN :sortField = \'total5Ss\' AND :sortDirection = \'asc\' THEN m.total5Ss END ASC, CASE WHEN :sortField = \'total5Ss\' AND :sortDirection = \'desc\' THEN m.total5Ss END DESC, m.id ASC") List<MockTestResult> findAllResultsByMockTestIdWithSort(@Param("mockTestId") Integer mockTestId, @Param("sortField") String sortField, @Param("sortDirection") String sortDirection)

    • findAllResultsByMockTestWithIntegratedKlassSortAndDate

      @Query(" SELECT mtr FROM MockTestResult mtr\n JOIN mtr.student student\n WHERE mtr.mockTest = :mockTest\n ORDER BY CASE WHEN :sortDirection = \'asc\'\n THEN (\n SELECT COALESCE(MAX(k.sortOrder), 0)\n FROM KlassStudent ks\n JOIN ks.klass k\n WHERE ks.student = student\n AND :date BETWEEN ks.createdAt AND ks.changedAt\n )\n ELSE -(\n SELECT COALESCE(MAX(k.sortOrder), 0)\n FROM KlassStudent ks\n JOIN ks.klass k\n WHERE ks.student = student\n AND :date BETWEEN ks.createdAt AND ks.changedAt\n )\n END\n") List<MockTestResult> findAllResultsByMockTestWithIntegratedKlassSortAndDate(@Param("mockTest") MockTest mockTest, @Param("sortDirection") String sortDirection, @Param("date") LocalDate date)

    • findAverageForEachKlassForEachSubject

      @Query(" SELECT NEW com.example.demo.dto.AverageScoreAndStandardScoreForKlass(\n CASE WHEN :subject = \'japanese\' then ROUND(avg(mtr.japanese), 1)\n WHEN :subject = \'math\' then ROUND(avg(mtr.math), 1)\n WHEN :subject = \'english\' then ROUND(avg(mtr.english), 1)\n WHEN :subject = \'science\' then ROUND(avg(mtr.science), 1)\n WHEN :subject = \'social\' then ROUND(avg(mtr.social), 1)\n END,\n CASE WHEN :subject = \'japanese\' then ROUND(avg(mtr.japaneseSs), 1)\n WHEN :subject = \'math\' then ROUND(avg(mtr.mathSs), 1)\n WHEN :subject = \'english\' then ROUND(avg(mtr.englishSs), 1)\n WHEN :subject = \'science\' then ROUND(avg(mtr.scienceSs), 1)\n WHEN :subject = \'social\' then ROUND(avg(mtr.socialSs), 1)\n END,\n COALESCE(k.name, \'\u672a\u6240\u5c5e\'),\n \'\'\n )\n FROM MockTestResult mtr\n JOIN mtr.student student\n LEFT JOIN KlassStudent ks ON ks.student = student\n AND :date BETWEEN ks.createdAt AND ks.changedAt\n LEFT JOIN ks.klass k ON k.subject = :subject\n WHERE mtr.mockTest = :mockTest\n GROUP BY COALESCE(k.name,\'\u672a\u6240\u5c5e\')\n ORDER BY CASE WHEN k.name IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END,\n k.sortOrder DESC NULLS LAST\n") List<AverageScoreAndStandardScoreForKlass> findAverageForEachKlassForEachSubject(@Param("subject") String subject, @Param("mockTest") MockTest mockTest, @Param("date") LocalDate date)

    • findAverageForIntegratedKlassForTotalSubject

      @Query(" SELECT NEW com.example.demo.dto.AverageScoreAndStandardScoreForKlass(\n CASE WHEN :totalSubject = \'total3\' then ROUND(avg(mtr.total3), 1)\n WHEN :totalSubject = \'total5\' then ROUND(avg(mtr.total5), 1)\n END,\n CASE WHEN :totalSubject = \'total3\' then ROUND(avg(mtr.total3Ss), 1)\n WHEN :totalSubject = \'total5\' then ROUND(avg(mtr.total5Ss), 1)\n END,\n COALESCE((CASE WHEN k.sortOrder = -1 THEN \'\u500b\u5225\' ELSE k.name END), \'\u672a\u6240\u5c5e\'),\n \'\'\n )\n FROM MockTestResult mtr\n JOIN mtr.student student\n LEFT JOIN KlassStudent ks ON ks.student = student\n AND :date BETWEEN ks.createdAt AND ks.changedAt\n LEFT JOIN ks.klass k ON ks.klass = k\n AND k.sortOrder = (\n SELECT MAX(k2.sortOrder)\n FROM KlassStudent ks2\n JOIN ks2.klass k2\n WHERE ks2.student = student\n AND :date BETWEEN ks2.createdAt AND ks2.changedAt\n )\n WHERE mtr.mockTest = :mockTest\n GROUP BY COALESCE((CASE WHEN k.sortOrder = -1 THEN \'\u500b\u5225\' ELSE k.name END), \'\u672a\u6240\u5c5e\')\n ORDER BY CASE WHEN k.name IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END,\n k.sortOrder DESC NULLS LAST\n") List<AverageScoreAndStandardScoreForKlass> findAverageForIntegratedKlassForTotalSubject(@Param("totalSubject") String totalSubject, @Param("mockTest") MockTest mockTest, @Param("date") LocalDate date)

    • findFirstByMockTest

      @Query("SELECT mtr FROM MockTestResult mtr WHERE mtr.mockTest = :mockTest ORDER BY mtr.student.id LIMIT 1") MockTestResult findFirstByMockTest(MockTest mockTest)

    • findAverageForEveryKlassForEachSubject

      @Query(" SELECT NEW com.example.demo.dto.AverageScoreAndStandardScoreForKlass(\n CASE WHEN :subject = \'japanese\' then ROUND(avg(mtr.japanese), 1)\n WHEN :subject = \'math\' then ROUND(avg(mtr.math), 1)\n WHEN :subject = \'english\' then ROUND(avg(mtr.english), 1)\n WHEN :subject = \'science\' then ROUND(avg(mtr.science), 1)\n WHEN :subject = \'social\' then ROUND(avg(mtr.social), 1)\n END,\n CASE WHEN :subject = \'japanese\' then ROUND(avg(mtr.japaneseSs), 1)\n WHEN :subject = \'math\' then ROUND(avg(mtr.mathSs), 1)\n WHEN :subject = \'english\' then ROUND(avg(mtr.englishSs), 1)\n WHEN :subject = \'science\' then ROUND(avg(mtr.scienceSs), 1)\n WHEN :subject = \'social\' then ROUND(avg(mtr.socialSs), 1)\n END,\n \'\u5168\u3066\',\n \'\'\n )\n FROM MockTestResult mtr\n JOIN mtr.student student\n INNER JOIN KlassStudent ks ON ks.student = student\n AND :date BETWEEN ks.createdAt AND ks.changedAt\n INNER JOIN ks.klass k ON k.subject = :subject\n WHERE mtr.mockTest = :mockTest\n") AverageScoreAndStandardScoreForKlass findAverageForEveryKlassForEachSubject(@Param("subject") String subject, @Param("mockTest") MockTest mockTest, @Param("date") LocalDate testDate)

    • findAverageForEveryKlassForEachTotalSubject

      @Query(" SELECT NEW com.example.demo.dto.AverageScoreAndStandardScoreForKlass(\n CASE WHEN :totalSubject = \'total3\' then ROUND(avg(mtr.total3), 1)\n WHEN :totalSubject = \'total5\' then ROUND(avg(mtr.total5), 1)\n END,\n CASE WHEN :totalSubject = \'total3\' then ROUND(avg(mtr.total3Ss), 1)\n WHEN :totalSubject = \'total5\' then ROUND(avg(mtr.total5Ss), 1)\n END,\n \'\u5168\u3066\',\n \'\'\n )\n FROM MockTestResult mtr\n JOIN mtr.student student\n INNER JOIN KlassStudent ks ON ks.student = student\n AND :date BETWEEN ks.createdAt AND ks.changedAt\n WHERE mtr.mockTest = :mockTest\n") AverageScoreAndStandardScoreForKlass findAverageForEveryKlassForEachTotalSubject(@Param("totalSubject") String totalSubject, @Param("mockTest") MockTest mockTest, @Param("date") LocalDate testDate)
